snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a study of the best times to post to social media, a report from Foxconn on features of the coming Apple TV and a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a study of the best times to post to social media, a report from Foxconn on features of the coming Apple TV and a Facebook founder renouncing his U.S. citizenship.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Mother Myth and Big Omaha
